content.text: Hello there!
Hey how's it going?
Pretty good. I just got done practicing my bass guitar for a few hours.
Nice! What kind of music do you play?
I like to play a lot of different types of music, but I really like playing rock and blues.
Oh nice. I like to listen to a lot of rock and blues music.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I really like the Rolling Stones, the Beatles, and the Who.
Those are all great bands! I love the Stones and the Beatles.
Yeah they're both really good. I also like some newer bands like the Black Keys and the Arctic Monkeys.
I've heard of the Black Keys, but I haven't heard of the Arctic Monkeys. I'll have to check them out.
Yeah they're a really good British rock band. I think you'd like them.
Awesome, I'll definitely check them out.
Nice! So what do you do for fun besides playing guitar?
I like to hang out with my family and friends, go fishing, and play video games.
Oh nice. I like to go fishing too. I don't get to do it as much as I'd like to, but it's always fun when I can.
Yeah it's really relaxing. I like to go to the lake and just sit on the dock and fish for hours.
That sounds really nice. I wish I had a lake nearby.
You should definitely try to find a place to go fishing sometime. It's really relaxing.
Yeah I will. Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome.
